name: COALITION OF RESIDENTIAL EXCELLENCE
description: Coalition group of small, cottage style home non-profit, foster care organizations
firms: C6 STRATEGIES, LLC (FKA MS. DANA W. HUDSON)
sampleDescriptions: Working to include the small, cottage style homes on the continuum of care for foster children and families in crisis
Working to include the small, cottage style homes on the continuum of care for foster children and families in crisis
Advocating for COVID-19 pandemic relief in the stimulus legislation.

Advocating for the small, cottage, family style residences (home-like), who serve children in foster care and families in crisis, should remain on the continuum of care for children in need of support
